cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Kentico community member, Milan Lund, gives a thoughtful and detailed overview of his approach to migrating content from Kentico 12 Portal Engine to Xperience by Kentico and shares some creative tricks he used in the process. He also mentions the Kentico Migration Tool has been improved in the meantime and is also a viable upgrade solution.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: How to Migrate Content from Kentico CMS Portal Engine to Xperience by Kentico
